description: Howard Quayle remains in "full control" of the government while self-isolating, says health minister.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man chief minister isolating with 'mild symptoms'
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man chief minister isolating with 'mild symptoms' - BBC News
maintext: A total of 73 of those diagnosed with the virus are now classed as "presumed recovered" by the health department, having completed the required period of isolation.
